rule: The response should contain just the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with no additional text.
input: sentence: Yesterday was a beautiful day., word: beautiful
validityText:
The sentence "Yesterday was a beautiful day." is a valid English sentence with proper punctuation.
The word "beautiful" is a valid English word and is present in the given sentence. 
The word does not contain any spaces or invalid characters. 

OK
